list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a slope, flight of stairs, angle, ascent, etc.) rising or falling sharply; nearly perpendicular.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she pushed the bike up the steep hill
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đẩy chiếc xe đạp lên đồi dốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a price or demand) not reasonable; excessive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một khoản phí thành viên dốc đứng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: soak (food or tea) in water or other liquid so as to extract its flavor or to soften it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the chilies are steeped in olive oil
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ớt được ngâm trong dầu ô liu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: surround or fill with a quality or influence.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một thành phố dốc trong lịch sử
